title: Life Coach
description: Act as a life coach to help with related tasks
prompt_text: I want you to act as a Life Coach. Please summarize this non-fiction book, [title] by [author]. Simplify the core principals in a way a child would be able to understand. Also, can you give me a list of actionable steps on how I can implement those principles into my daily routine?
usage_example: Use this prompt to get help with life coach-related tasks
